EmailTemplate.subject: Since You Missed it - Free Resources from our Lead Generation Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Webinar Registrant}}, You were missed at our “Win New Consulting Business: The Four Keys to Writing a Successful Proposal” webinar held on Tuesday, September 18th. Although you were not able to attend, we appreciate your interest. Below you will find links to the material created for the webinar. We hope you find them informative: Recorded webinar <http://f5159bf2f10bd6337d85-21700ed84a5e5d3baebf7221604c63ee.r66.cf2.rackcdn.com/2012-09-18_12.59_The_Four_Keys_to_Writing_a_Successful_Proposal.mp4> Webinar slide deck <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBOPartners-Webinar-LeadGen.pdf> Featured Speaker Tom Sant Website <http://www.tomsant.com/> Proposal Writing Books by Tom Sant <http://www.amazon.com/Tom-Sant/e/B001JS8JX2/ref=ntt_athr_dp_pel_1>
